SwimMod_Mariner_Questions: Old Mariner: Ah, I see ye caught the diving bug, {0}. Might be that I have something you could use in your undersea-faring journey... are ye interested?
SwimMod_Mariner_Questions_Old: Old Mariner: Ah, back again I see... are ye ready to prove yer worth and take me buried treasure?
SwimMod_Mariner_Questions_Yes: Old Mariner: I thought as much, ho ho! But ye'll have to prove yer worth first, by answering me questions... First:
SwimMod_Mariner_Questions_No: Old Mariner: Well, then, off with ye... I've no time for an unwashed land-lubber.
SwimMod_Mariner_Questions_Yes_Old: Old Mariner: I thought as much, ho ho! Then answer me questions... First:
SwimMod_Mariner_Questions_No_Old: Old Mariner: Arr, ye best quit wasting both our time, and come back when ye've mastered the wisdom of the ancients.
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_Y_1: Old Mariner: Yar, well answered, {0}! Ready for another?
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_Y_2: Old Mariner: He he, that was a tough one! Well done, {0}! And now:
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_Y_3: Old Mariner: Ah, there might be some wisdom in ye after all, {0}! Good answer! How about this one:
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_Y_4: Old Mariner: Well sink me like me old pappy's schooner... right ye be, {0}! Here's another:
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_Y_5: Old Mariner: Yo ho ho! Ye've a real knack for these, {0}! Next question:
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_N: Ah, I should have known it was too good to be true... Come back when ye've gained the knowledge of the ancients, {0}!
SwimMod_Mariner_Answer_S: Ha! Yer going to have to do better than that, {0}! Come back when ye can take me questions seriously!
SwimMod_Mariner_Wrong_Today: Nay, {0}, ye've already had yer chance this day. Come back, tomorrow, or better yet, come back when ye have improved yerself in the knowledge of the ancients.
SwimMod_Mariner_Completed: Well done, {0}! Ye've proven yerself well-versed in the knowledge of the ancients... It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_1: In order to maintain air-speed velocity, how many times per second must a swallow beat its wings?
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_2: A box without hinges, key, or lid, Yet golden treasure inside is hid...
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_2_4: Dude, I'm pretty sure that's plagiarism.#S
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_3: What sort of things gyre and gymble?
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_3_4: Orrysay, Iay on'tday eakspay igpay atinlay.#S
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_4: Is this a yes or no question?
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_5: What is the meaning of life, the universe, and everything?
SwimMod_Mariner_Question_5_4: Well, it's certainly not living in an underwater cave waiting for people to come so you can ask them stupid riddles.#S
GMCM-EnableMod-Description: Enables and Disables mod. Requires game restart to go into effect.
GMCM-ReadyToSwim-Description: Allow character to jump to the water automatically when you walk to the land's edge.
GMCM-ShowOxygenBar-Description: Whether to show the oxygen bar or not when you dive into the water.
GMCM-SwimSuitAlways-Description: If set true, your character will always wear a swimsuit.
GMCM-NoAutoSwimSuit-Description: If set's false, character will NOT wear a swimsuit automatically when you enter the water.
GMCM-DisplayHatWithSwimsuit-Description: If set to true, will display your hat while you are wearing your swimming suit.
GMCM-AllowActionsWhileInSwimsuit-Descrip: Allow you to use items while you're swimming (may cause some visual bugs).
GMCM-AllowRunningWhileInSwimsuit-Descrip: Allow you to run while you're swimming (may cause some visual bugs)
GMCM-EnableClickToSwim-Description: Enables or Disables ability to manual jump to the water (by clicking certain key).
GMCM-SwimRestoresVitals-Description: If set's true, your HP and Energy will restore while you're swimming (like in the Bath).
GMCM-SwimSuitKey-Description: Change character cloth to swimsuit and vice versa.
GMCM-ManualJumpButton-Description: Allow you to jump into the water by clicking a certain key.
GMCM-PreventJumpButton-Description: Prevents jumping into the water while held.
GMCM-StaminaLossPerSecond-Description: Your Energy will be drained by this amount for every second you are swimming.
GMCM-StaminaLossMultiplierWithGear-Descr: The stamina drain will be multiplied by this amount when wearing the scuba gear.
GMCM-ScubaFinSpeed-Description: The speed boost the scuba fins give.
GMCM-TriggerDistanceMult-Description: Multiply jump sensitivity by this amount.
GMCM-MustClickOnOppositeTerrain-Descript: Whether you must click on land to leave the water (or vice versa) or can just click in the direction of land (when using click to swim).
GMCM-OxygenMult-Description: Sets oxygen multiplier (Energy times Mult equals O2).
GMCM-AddFishies-Description: Allow fishes to spawn in underwater.
GMCM-AddCrabs-Description: Allow crabs to spawn in underwater.
GMCM-BreatheSound-Description: If set to true, while you're underwater you will hear a breathing sound.
GMCM-MineralPerThousandMin-Description: Sets the minimum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-MineralPerThousandMax-Description: Sets the maximum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-CrabsPerThousandMin-Description: Sets the minimum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-CrabsPerThousandMax-Description: Sets the maximum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-PercentChanceCrabIsMimic-Descriptio: Sets chance to change a crab into a mimic.
GMCM-MinSmolFishies-Description: Sets minimal quantity that can be met underwater.
GMCM-MaxSmolFishies-Description: Sets maximal quantity that can be met underwater.
GMCM-BigFishiesPerThousandMin-Descriptio: Sets the minimum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-BigFishiesPerThousandMax-Descriptio: Sets the maximum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-OceanForagePerThousandMin-Descripti: Sets the minimum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-OceanForagePerThousandMax-Descripti: Sets the maximum amount per thousand tiles.
GMCM-MinOceanChests-Description: Sets minimal quantity that can be found underwater.
GMCM-MaxOceanChests-Description: Sets maximal quantity that can be found underwater.
GMCM-OxygenBarXOffset-Description: The X (left/right) offset of the oxygen bar. Increasing it by 4 moves it right by 1 pixel.
GMCM-OxygenBarYOffset-Description: The Y (up/down) offset of the oxygen bar. Increasing it by 4 moves it down by 1 pixel.
